article_title: Obama Signs Rare Bipartisan Health Bill On Hospice, Post-Acute Quality

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: President Obama today signed bipartisan legislation into law that will bring more frequent surveys to hospice providers as part of a broader bipartisan action designed to increase quality, transparency and accountability to the “post-acute” care industry. Unlike the Affordable Care Act, which garnered no Republican support when it passed both houses [...]
